parameters.name: Bandwidth
parameters.description: The maximum bandwidth of the GA instance. Unit: Mbit/s. Set the value to **10**.

parameters.name: GlobalAccelerationInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the GA instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the GA instance.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
